name: Lazer Lynx
description:
CONTROLS: 

  • Press and hold left click to activate your laser
  • Scroll wheel will zoom the camera in and out for a better look at things
  • move the mouse to move the laser around the room
  • shaking the laser will make it more interesting to Lynx
  • Lasers have been known to burn things...

Guide Lynx around the room to have him interact with things and discover a way to board the escape pod and go home. There are 10 achievements in total to discover, try to find them all!

you play as that guy no one likes in the office space station that no body likes. Last night, at the office Christmas party, they tied you to a chair while you were passed out drunk. You have awoken to find no one is there except Lynx, the rodent removal system on board the ship. He also happens to be a cat that is fascinated by lasers.

Clearly your excellent work isn't appreciated here. It's time to quit this crappy job and head back to Earth. But how? you're tied to a chair with nothing but a laser pointer... wait a minute.
